ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: foo is the function you want to use. Other functions like bar and baz aren't half as good as foo. The JSBot page is badly out of date. The Function group has other functions in this api.
ENTRY.SYNTAX:
void foo(int x, float y)
Does what x does.
Does what y does, better than x.

EXAMPLE.desc: Do it like this or you will suffer!

ENTRY.EXAMPLE: foo (1, 2) /* calls foo */ foo (3, 4) /* calls foo with better arguments*/

ENTRY.DESCRIPTION: bar is less than half as good as foo.
ENTRY.SYNTAX:
void bar(int x, float y)
Does what x does.
Does what y does, better than x.

EXAMPLE.desc: Do it like this or you will suffer!

ENTRY.EXAMPLE: bar (1, 2) /* calls bar */ bar (3, 4) /* calls bar with worser arguments*/
